question: Which programming languages or frameworks should I be using to solve the %type%?
answer: The administrator/ employer organization of  the %type% has enabled a set of languages or frameworks that needs to be used to solve this  particular %type%. Please see the list in the drop down and choose the one that you would like to use.

question: I am not able to see question and images? What should i do?
answer: The above issue could occur due to slow or missing internet connection. You can refresh your browser window by pressing (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + R). If the issue is not resolved after refreshing, please contact support@doselect.com

question: My screen is freezed and i am not able to navigate between the problems? What should i do?
answer: This can primarily occur due to slow internet connection. You can resolve this by refreshing your screen by pressing (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + R).

question: What happens to my %type% if i lose the internet connectivity while taking a %type%?
answer: Your %type% environment would not be available without an active connection. You need to wait for the internet to resume the %type%. Please refresh your screen by pressing (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + R). Your existing solution before losing the connection will be saved. The %type%'s timer would keep running.

question: I'm getting “Webcam.js (or) Waiting for webcam” error or “AGREE AND CONTINUE” button is disabled. What should I do?
answer:
There are three possible cases here:
  • Your browser has denied the permission to access the webcam. You need to allow the browser to access your webcam to continue with the %type%.
  • Webcam not found on your system. Please make sure that the webcam is working fine on your system.
  • Your webcam's resolution is less than or equal to 0.3 MP. Minimum supported webcam resolution is 640 * 480.

question: I'm getting “System time” error or 'AGREE AND CONTINUE' button is disabled. What should I do?
answer: Clock Error: Check that your system clock is set to the current date-time and refresh the page before you try again
